sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Sale or Pledge of Goods by Minors Act.

sections.heading: It shall be unlawful for any junk dealer, pawn broker, or any
sections.text:
second hand dealer, either directly or indirectly, to purchase or receive
by way of barter or exchange, or otherwise, anything of value, or to
receive on deposit or pledge anything of value, as security for a loan of
money, from any person, either male or female, under the age of their legal
majorities respectively.

sections.heading: Any person violating the provisions of section 1 of this act shall,
sections.text: upon conviction, be guilty of a petty offense.
